name: Super Smash Stick Things
description:
A game with a fancy interactive loading screen. Press any key while the game loads to initiate the game. Once Loading receives 100% damage the game will finish loading. Press a key while the game loads to trigger the game.

The idea was for this to be a loading screen for a smash bros type game where if the user presses a key they can fight the smash bros logo.

Controls:

WASD : Move

J: Punch (Hold it to actually make contact and hit the other stick thing more often)
